name: Pho-Vietnamese Noodle Soup
author: Van Dana
summary: A homemade version of a spicy traditional Vietnamese soup.
ingredients: 2  star anise pods, or more to taste
1 teaspoon sriracha hot sauce, or more to taste
½ (8 ounce) package dried thin rice noodles
directions: Combine chicken broth, star anise, ginger paste, and sriracha hot sauce in a stockpot; bring to a boil
Add tofu, broccoli, mushrooms, and carrots and cook until vegetables are tender, 5 to 7 minutes
Bring a separate pot of water to a boil
Remove pot from heat and add rice noodles to the water; let stand until noodles are softened, about 4 minutes
Drain water and rinse noodles under cold water
Remove star anise from broth mixture
Pile cold noodles into serving bowls and top with broth mixture; garnish with green onion
